driver = <selenium.webdriver.chrome.webdriver.WebDriver (session="6cc3609ef2bb03ba61b5fcda8b7d530c")>
navigate_to_approval = None

    @allure.epic("协同办公")
    @allure.feature("我的工作")
    @allure.story("我的审批")
    @allure.description("根据文件名称查询")
    @pytest.mark.parametrize("driver",['chrome'],indirect=True)
    def test_file_search_by_name(driver, navigate_to_approval):
        """测试按文件名查询"""
        wait = WebDriverWait(driver, 10)
        try:
            # 文件名查询测试
            file_name = wait.until(EC.presence_of_element_located(
                (By.XPATH, '//*[@id="app"]//div[label[@for="file_name"]]//input')))
            file_name.send_keys("申请")
    
            wait.until(EC.presence_of_element_located(
                (By.XPATH, '//form//button[contains(@class,"el-button--primary")]'))).click()
            time.sleep(2)
    
            wait.until(EC.presence_of_element_located(
                (By.XPATH, '//form//button[contains(@class,"el-button--success")]'))).click()
            text=wait.until(EC.presence_of_element_located(
                (By.XPATH, '//tbody/tr[1]/td[2]//span/span')))
            n = text.text
            if "申请" not in n :
                highlight_element(driver,text)
                allure.attach(driver.get_screenshot_as_png(), name="文件名称查询失败截图",attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG)
                reset_element(driver, text)
            assert "申请" in n
        except Exception as e:
            # 截图并附加到 Allure 报告
